extendedInfo.description: Familiar turns your smartphone or tablet into a stunning picture and video frame connected to family and friends. Photos and videos are delivered privately to their desktop, screensaver, tablet, and smartphone photo wallet.   **Please send feedback and support requests to feedback@familiar.com. We take feedback seriously and fix bugs promptly**Now everyone in your family can share the best moments right when they happen. Familiar makes connecting with friends and family easy so you will always have amazing new pictures and videos to enjoy right on your phone or tablet.Is your Mom or Dad always complaining about not having the latest photos and videos of the grandkids?  Surprise and delight them by inviting them to have their very own beautifully crafted slideshows of their loved ones.Highlights- VideoDo you have dozens of videos on your phone you rarely ever watch? With Familiar your favorite videos brighten your day regularly, integrated tastefully with photos. Snippets of your videos are automatically stitched together with photos to create a personalized viewing experience right on your screen, and the screens of loved ones.- Tell Your Story: Familiar personalizes your idle screens with your most precious photos and videos and those of your loved ones'. An all-in-one picture frame, screensaver, and TV channel personalized for you using our smart screen technology. A simple glance will brighten your day.- Personalized: Connect family and friends to bring their stories to life on your screen. Their channels stream photos and videos real-time to your screen. Bring your family and friends together with a customized and personalized screen experience.- Compatible: Familiar works with popular photo sharing services: Facebook, Instagram, SmugMug, Picasa and more. And it works across all devices - computers, tablets and smartphones â and platforms.Additional features: - Video: capture and share videos- Active browse and passive photo frame mode - Cinematic slideshows updated real-time with photos & videos from family and friends. - Privately send high quality, stunning photos and videos directly to the phones and tablets of your family and friends. - Keep track of the photos you love so you can revisit them later. - Easily browse photos of your family and closest friends. - Save the best photos directly to your photo gallery. - Easily import photos from Facebook, Instagram, Picasa, and SmugMug. - Get notified when new photos and videos are added to your Familiar picture frame. - Touch screen optimizedHow Familiar uses each permission:- Full Internet Access: Required to send and receive photos using Familiar's online, secure servers.- Read Contact Data: Used to access your contacts when you invite family and friends. Your full contact list is NEVER uploaded and stored on Familiar. Only the contacts you select are invited to join Familiar.- Storage: Familiar stores image thumbnails and fullscreen images on your phone or tablet. The space used can be adjusted in the app settings.- System Tools: Required for push notifications. Familiar does not prevent your phone from sleeping.

reviews.title: Good photo frame app
reviews.comment: I find that I get the most value out of Familiar by using it as an automatically-updated photo frame for my phone and tablet. What I usually do is dock my nexus 7 in its dock, and Familiar starts up automatically. It refreshes itself with the latest photos from my family and gives me a glimpse of what\'s going on in their lives. The new format is harder to navigate \"on-demand\", but I look forward to that being fixed going forward.
reviews.author: Aakash Kambuj

reviews.title: Pretty good!
reviews.comment: I mainly use it as a photo frame... The idea is great, but i find it slightly harder to start a slideshow (too many clicks).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible update!
reviews.comment: This program used to be great, but the recent update makes it annoying and useless.  Don\'t bother!
reviews.author: Stacy Smelker

reviews.title: Traded ease of use for design
reviews.comment: Come on, what\'s the point of making a pimp user interface design while loosing overview and ease of navigation and ease of use?! It\'s really awkward to navigate through photos now and I\'m an advanced user. There\'s no way my parents will be able to use it now. Please give the option to revert back to the previous (or something similar functionality) UI quickly or I will have to uninstall it from all my family devices and search for an other app!
reviews.author: Tam\303\241s T\303\263th

reviews.title: Last update has ruined this
reviews.comment: I have no objection to interface overhauls, but they have to make the experience better. This one is terrible. Clumsy to use and less intuitive. I\'m not even sure about the addition of video. It works better as a photo gallery app only in my opinion.
reviews.author: Ian Dunn

reviews.title: just for slideshows, viewing new pictures doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I would like to use it for my father to show him the most recent pictures of his grandchild.   However the interaction for browsing new pictures is really complicated and seems broken. Clicking on the polaroid of recent activity shows only 1 picture of all the added pictures and there is no way in browsing to the other pictures in that set.   I also try to delete the sample channel, but it returns all the time. For sure they need to do some work on the interaction, but I didn\'t find anything comparable that could be easy for not so technical people.   The slideshow works ok.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrific update
reviews.comment: Please revert back to the old UI. Love the new ability to share video but the app has lost its ease of use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the addition of videos. Familiar crashes allll the time on my phone and some of the photos I added are still pending upload...for over a week now
reviews.author: Angela Smiley

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: I liked the old format much better. While the new update is more visually aesthetic, it\'s not as user-friendly. Thus, I don\'t use it as much as I used to.
reviews.author: Ingrid Wong

reviews.comment: Super easy
reviews.author: Boris Guskee

reviews.title: Recent update
reviews.comment: Updates have made the app more difficult to use. At least bring back the ability to view all photos.
reviews.author: Andre Lai

reviews.comment: Updates made it difficult as I do not know what each symbols mean (its easy to forget)
reviews.author: Angie P

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I love it! I set it up on my bookshelf and turn on the slideshow feature. Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app - love the video feature
reviews.comment: It\'s a perfect way for my family to see all the best photos and videos of our kids with nearly zero effort. Now my mom can stop nagging me to help her download the photos I send via email.  Simply brilliant!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: Sending photos of my baby on a daily bases to my in-laws with this app makes it possible for they to grow with her even while they are far. Its definitely 5 stars!
reviews.author: meadow mark

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: I don\'t use it much. But the family likes getting pictures off the new baby this way
reviews.author: Calley Haws

reviews.title: If you have just a few pics
reviews.comment: I have thousands of pics to share. Finding them in your app is impossible. You have no albums, no album dates, tags... Not even recognizing the media galleries when importing photos, one flat flask with all my pics scrolling on hunderds of screens. Unusable. Sorry.
reviews.author: George Anghel

reviews.title: A great company
reviews.comment: Familiar is a great small company to work for, and it shows in their product. The app encapsulates the familial spirit that was the inspiration for the company.
reviews.author: Scott Steussy

reviews.title: great for keeping in touch
reviews.comment: my family love keeping us updated in pictures
reviews.author: Linda Dennis

reviews.title: BAD videoing
reviews.comment: I\'ve been searching for an app that u can make callages with videos and pictures and I thought I finally found one but it won\'t even let me use videos! Do not install!
reviews.author: christina aragon
